dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 세계의 끝. 망각의 문이 눈앞에 있다.
dialogues.text_en: The end of the world. The Gate of Oblivion stands before you.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: This is it... Where Liliana is.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 세 개의 심장이 공명한다. 문이 천천히 열린다.
dialogues.text_en: The Three Hearts resonate. The gate slowly opens.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text: 기다려, 리리아나. 이번엔 진짜로 구하러 갈게.
dialogues.text_en: Wait for me, Liliana. This time, I'm coming to truly save you.

environment_events.text: 형체 없는 존재들이 떠다닌다. 세계가 잊은 자들.
environment_events.text_en: Formless beings drift by. Those the world has forgotten.
"My name is... my name... I can't remember..."

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text: 리리아나만이 아니었어... 이렇게 많은 존재들이 잊혀졌다니.
dialogues.text_en: It wasn't just Liliana... So many beings have been forgotten.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text: 이름도, 얼굴도, 업적도... 전부 사라진 거야.
dialogues.text_en: Their names, faces, achievements... All erased.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: ...I won't let Liliana end up like this.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 거대한 공간. 중앙에 빛나는 눈이 아리온을 바라본다.
dialogues.text_en: A vast space. A glowing eye at the center watches Arion.

dialogues.speaker: guardian
dialogues.text_en: Halt. You who possess memory.

dialogues.speaker: guardian
dialogues.text: 잊혀진 것은 잊혀져야 한다. 그것이 세계의 균형.
dialogues.text_en: What is forgotten must remain forgotten. That is the balance of the world.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Balance? Liliana is not meant to be forgotten.

dialogues.speaker: guardian
dialogues.text_en: To reclaim her, you must pay the price.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: I know. I'm going anyway.

dialogues.speaker: guardian
dialogues.text_en: ...Then prove your resolve.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 윤곽이 흐릿한 노인이 서있다. 얼굴이 계속 변한다.
dialogues.text_en: A blurry-outlined elder stands here. Their face keeps changing.

dialogues.speaker: sage
dialogues.text: 오래... 기다렸다. 봉인을 풀러 온 자여.
dialogues.text_en: I've waited... long. You who came to break the seal.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Who... are you?

dialogues.speaker: sage
dialogues.text: 나도 한때는 이름이 있었지. 업적도. 하지만...
dialogues.text_en: I once had a name. Achievements too. But...

dialogues.speaker: sage
dialogues.text_en: I paid the price. Like Liliana.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: You too, for someone...?

dialogues.speaker: sage
dialogues.text_en: Probably. I think so. I don't remember, though.

price_explanation.speaker: sage
price_explanation.text_en: Let me tell you how to break the seal.

price_explanation.speaker: sage
price_explanation.text_en: First, you become forgotten in her place.

price_explanation.speaker: sage
price_explanation.text_en: The world forgets you. Including Liliana.

price_explanation.speaker: sage
price_explanation.text: 넌 존재하지만, 아무도 인식하지 못해. 영원히.
price_explanation.text_en: You'll exist, but no one will perceive you. Forever.

price_explanation.speaker: sage
price_explanation.text_en: Offer something else as the price.

price_explanation.speaker: sage
price_explanation.text: 이 세계 너머의 무언가. 윤회의 실 같은 것.
price_explanation.text_en: Something beyond this world. Like the thread of reincarnation.

price_explanation.speaker: sage
price_explanation.text: ...가서 직접 확인해라. 망각의 화신이 알려줄 거다.
price_explanation.text_en: ...Go and see for yourself. The Incarnation of Oblivion will tell you.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 거대한 수정 관. 그 안에 리리아나가 잠들어 있다.
dialogues.text_en: A massive crystal coffin. Liliana sleeps within.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Liliana...!

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 평화로운 얼굴. 저주의 흔적은 없다. 마치 꿈을 꾸는 것처럼.
dialogues.text_en: A peaceful face. No trace of the curse. As if she's simply dreaming.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: ...Did you wait? Did you wait long?

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: I'm sorry. For being late. For taking so long.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: But now I've come for you. For real.

third_heart_trial.speaker: system
third_heart_trial.text_en: The Three Hearts begin to glow.

third_heart_trial.speaker: system
third_heart_trial.text: 세 번째 심장 - 미래의 심장이 완성을 요구한다.
third_heart_trial.text_en: The Third Heart - Heart of the Future demands completion.

third_heart_trial.speaker: voice
third_heart_trial.text: "네 의지를 증명하라. 어떤 대가를 치르더라도 그녀를 구할 것인가?"
third_heart_trial.text_en: "Prove your resolve. Will you save her no matter the cost?"

third_heart_trial.speaker: arion
third_heart_trial.text: 내가 잊혀져도, 사라져도, 그녀만 살 수 있다면.
third_heart_trial.text_en: Even if I'm forgotten, even if I vanish, as long as she can live.

third_heart_trial.speaker: system
third_heart_trial.text: 세 번째 심장 - 미래의 심장이 완성되었다.
third_heart_trial.text_en: The Third Heart - Heart of the Future is complete.

third_heart_trial.speaker: system
third_heart_trial.text_en: The Three Hearts resonate as one!

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text_en: Space distorts. A vast void appears.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: ...You've gathered the Three Hearts.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text: 오랜만이다. 이 봉인을 풀러 온 자는.
dialogues.text_en: It's been long since someone came to break this seal.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: You're... the Incarnation of Oblivion?

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: I am the world's 'forgetting'. Neither good nor evil.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: I merely maintain balance.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Release Liliana's seal.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: If you pay the price.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: But first... show me your worthiness.

battle_dialogues.speaker: oblivion
battle_dialogues.text_en: Forget the past. Your memories with her.

battle_dialogues.speaker: oblivion
battle_dialogues.text: 처음 만난 날. 함께한 시간. 전부 잊어라.
battle_dialogues.text_en: The day you met. The time you shared. Forget it all.

battle_dialogues.speaker: arion
battle_dialogues.text_en: The First Heart... protects my memories!

battle_dialogues.speaker: oblivion
battle_dialogues.text_en: Forget the present. Your very existence.

battle_dialogues.speaker: oblivion
battle_dialogues.text_en: Forget who you are. Your name. Your identity.

battle_dialogues.speaker: arion
battle_dialogues.text: 나는 아리온! 두 번째 심장이 나를 지킨다!
battle_dialogues.text_en: I am Arion! The Second Heart protects me!

battle_dialogues.speaker: arion
battle_dialogues.text_en: I will save Liliana. That's my future!

battle_dialogues.speaker: arion
battle_dialogues.text: 세 번째 심장... 미래의 심장이 답한다!
battle_dialogues.text_en: The Third Heart... the Heart of the Future answers!

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: ...I acknowledge it. Your resolve.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: I'll release the seal. If you pay the price.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: ...I understand. I'll become the price.

branch_check.note: 두 아이템 모두 소지 시 트루 엔딩 선택지 활성화

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: Then you shall be forgotten.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: The world will forget you. Including Liliana.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: ...I know. It's okay.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text: 그녀가 살 수 있다면. 행복할 수 있다면.
dialogues.text_en: If she can live. If she can be happy.

true_ending_route.condition: 약속의 반지 + 최초의 기억 결정 소지

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 약속의 반지가 빛난다. 최초의 기억 결정이 공명한다.
dialogues.text_en: The Ring of Promise glows. The Crystal of First Memory resonates.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: ...What is this?

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text: 윤회의 실... 여러 생에 걸친 인연.
dialogues.text_en: The thread of reincarnation... A bond spanning multiple lives.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: ...There is another way.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: What? Tell me!

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: Your bond. The thread that reincarnates.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text: 그것을 대가로 바치면 둘 다 살 수 있다.
dialogues.text_en: Offer that as the price, and both of you can live.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: But if that connection is severed...

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text_en: You will never meet in the next life. Forever.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text: 내가 대가가 되겠어. 나를 잊어도 돼.
dialogues.text_en: I'll be the price. Forget me.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text_en: Arion touches the seal.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 리리아나가 눈을 뜬다. 동시에 아리온이 흐려지기 시작한다.
dialogues.text_en: Liliana opens her eyes. At the same time, Arion begins to fade.

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text_en: ...Where am I? Why am I...?

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Liliana...

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 리리아나의 눈이 아리온을 스쳐 지나간다. 보이지 않는다.
dialogues.text_en: Liliana's eyes pass through Arion. She cannot see him.

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text_en: ...Strange. I feel like someone is here...

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: It's okay. This is right.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Live well, Liliana. Be happy.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: This time... for real.

epilogue.text_kr:
[시간이 흐른다]

리리아나는 새로운 삶을 살았다.
저주에서 해방되어, 평범하게, 행복하게.

하지만 가끔...
창밖을 바라보며 이상한 그리움을 느꼈다.

"왜 이렇게 그리운 걸까..."
"뭔가를 잊은 것 같아..."
"누군가... 소중한 누군가를..."

그녀의 곁에는 항상 보이지 않는 그림자가 서있었다.
그녀를 지키며. 영원히.

[THE END]

"잊혀진 영웅"
epilogue.text_en:
[Time passes]

Liliana lived a new life.
Freed from the curse, ordinary, happy.

But sometimes...
She'd gaze out the window, feeling a strange longing.

"Why do I feel such longing..."
"I feel like I've forgotten something..."
"Someone... someone precious..."

An invisible shadow always stood beside her.
Watching over her. Forever.

[THE END]

"The Forgotten Hero"

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: I'll offer... our reincarnating bond.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 약속의 반지와 최초의 기억 결정이 빛난다.
dialogues.text_en: The Ring of Promise and Crystal of First Memory shine.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 수많은 전생의 장면이 스쳐 지나간다. 다른 세계, 다른 시대의 두 사람.
dialogues.text_en: Countless scenes of past lives flash by. The two in different worlds, different eras.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: This is... our bond...?

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text: 여러 생에 걸친 사랑. 윤회해도 다시 만나는 인연.
dialogues.text_en: Love spanning multiple lives. A bond that reunites through reincarnation.

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text: 이것을 끊으면 이번 생의 기억은 유지된다. 하지만...
dialogues.text_en: Sever this, and your memories of this life will remain. But...

dialogues.speaker: oblivion
dialogues.text: 다음 생에서는 절대 만나지 못한다. 영원히.
dialogues.text_en: In the next life, you will never meet. Forever.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text_en: Liliana awakens.

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text_en: ...Arion?

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Liliana...! You recognize me...!

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text_en: ...I heard everything.

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text_en: That we won't meet in the next life...

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: ...Liliana.

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text_en: ...This life alone is enough.

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text: 다음 생에서 널 못 만나도... 지금 네가 있으니까.
dialogues.text_en: Even if I can't meet you in the next life... you're here now.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: ...Yes. Let's live this life as if it were eternity.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 두 사람이 함께 윤회의 실을 끊는다.
dialogues.text_en: Together, they sever the thread of reincarnation.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text_en: Light spreads. The seal is completely broken.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text_en: The two embrace each other.

epilogue.text_kr:
[시간이 흐른다]

피의 정원은 다시 흰 장미가 피었다.
리리아나가 가장 좋아했던 색.

"있잖아, 아리온."
"응?"
"다음 생이 없다는 거... 조금 무섭기도 해."

아리온이 웃는다.

"나도. 하지만..."
"지금이 있으니까."

두 사람이 손을 잡고 정원을 걷는다.

"다음 생은 없어도..."
"이번 생이 있으니까."

"...그거면 충분해."

[THE END]

"이번 생의 사랑"
epilogue.text_en:
[Time passes]

The Garden of Blood bloomed with white roses again.
Liliana's favorite color.

"Hey, Arion."
"Hmm?"
"The fact that there's no next life... it's a little scary."

Arion smiles.

"For me too. But..."
"We have now."

The two walk through the garden, hand in hand.

"Even without a next life..."
"We have this life."

"...That's enough."

[THE END]

"Love of This Life"

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: ...In the next life, I'll remember you.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Then... I'll protect you properly.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text_en: Something glowing faintly in the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: ...I promise.

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text_en: Hey, Arion.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Hmm?

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text: 다음 생이 없다는 거... 조금 무섭기도 해.
dialogues.text_en: The fact that there's no next life... it's a little scary.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: Me too.

dialogues.speaker: arion
dialogues.text_en: But...

dialogues.speaker: arion_liliana
dialogues.text_en: We have now.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text_en: Two hands clasp together. Warm light.

dialogues.speaker: liliana
dialogues.text_en: That's enough.
